name: 張添晉
objective: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
schedule:
a. 每星期四一次
b.
1. 資源再生與循環
2. 資源再生與循環之定義與範圍
2. 資源循環之國際發展趨勢分析
3. 減量與資源回收技
4. 資源再生之經濟效益
5. 資源與有害物質管理
6. 資源再生簡報與問題討論

name: 曾昭衡
objective:
永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed
schedule:
1. 優選工具簡介 Mathematic tools for system analysis
	線性規劃
	時間序列、啟發式演算法、類神經網路、灰色理論 / 模糊理論
	賽局理論、小世界理論
2. Models of Growth and Decay 
	Simple Logistic Model
	Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity
	Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity and Migration
3. Chaotic 混沌 Behavior (week 3 交 HW1)
	Dynamics of species
	Critical Reproduction Rate
	Bifurcation
4. Examples of Chaotic behavior
	Single Species System
	Two Species Competition System
	Two Species Predator-Prey System
5. Butterfly effect 蝴蝶效應. Deterministic or Random? (week 5 交 HW2)
6. Final Exam;
